text: Martha Vickers (May 28, 1925 â€“ November 2, 1971) was an American model and actress. She played minor roles in many movies during the early 1940s. She played the drug-addicted younger sister of Lauren Bacall's character in The Big Sleep (1946). She also starred in a musical, The Time, the Place and the Girl (also 1946). She also starred in Love and Learn and That Way with Women (both 1947). Vickers died of esophageal cancer at a hospital in Los Angeles on November 2, 1971 at the age of 46. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Michigan Category:People from Ann Arbor, Michigan Category:Models from Michigan
title: Martha Vickers
